Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/3e0fb934db43aaa0916378b669cfedb0/tumblr_inline_nguw5mKI751rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>Our office doors are now closed for the holiday. We’ll be back in the new year, refreshed and ready to get to work on the next update. We’ve got some huge things coming for you all in 2015!</p>

<p>In the meantime, keep an eye on all of our official channels for your dose of fun and breaking KSP news. Keep up with fellow KSP fans on our <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum.php"><strong>forums</strong></a> and <a href="http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/"><strong>/r/ksp</strong></a>. Don’t forget to get your daily dose of <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv"><strong>KSP-TV</strong></a>.</p>

<p>You, the KSP community, have once again lived up to your reputation as being one of the smartest, most thoughtful and overall best gaming communities out there in 2014. Thanks for sharing the ride with us so far. We’ll see you next year.</p>

<p>Happy holidays.</p>
Awww, thanks Squad! Have a great time off, you certainly earned it!
Have a great Christmas break, see you next year Thanks for all the hard work, you have earned the break.
Thank you Squad for all the hard work and for putting up with us!
Man, may all of you have a fantastic vacation, you definitely earned it!
May your vacations be free of explosions and unplanned disassemblies.

What a ride! Nice year, Squad. Thank you for all of your hard work to give us one of the best games ever...

Wait... "Huge things"... Like, say, planet sized...?
Happy Holidays (or winter) to everyone here!
Thanks Squad! Your break is defiantly well deserved.

What a ride! Nice year, Squad. Thank you for all of your hard work to give us one of the best games ever...

Wait... "Huge things"... Like, say, planet sized...?

Aerodynamics confirmed by MaxMaps.

Aerodynamics confirmed by MaxMaps.

That's not really "huge" though. Big, sure. But it's been wanted for a long time and it was proved that it could be done since like 0.17 by FAR.

May your vacations be free of explosions and unplanned disassemblies.

Unless, of course, you're into that kind of thing. No judgement.

Merry Christmas, Squad!

VACATION? What do you guys think this is, a job? KSP is a lifestyle! There is no time for a vacation. I mean you act like you have families or something. This is unacceptable behavior.

:-D Just kidding. Thanks for a great year, a great game, and the knowledge that even greater things are coming in the future. Enjoy yourselves, YOU EARNED IT!!!!!!
Enjoy the time off people!
Enjoy your time off, it is well-deserved!

Ahhh, A whole two weeks of college just to play KSP... If only there was a revert to launch button for real life.

"Nooo, Last day of holidays. *Revert*"

Wait wait. HL3 confirmed! Yeah!

Seriously, though, thanks Squad.
Thank you Squad! Have a Merry Xmas and a Happy New Year!
Feliz Navidad, muchachos.
Enjoy a well-deserved break!

Great job on this year's releases.

Pulled out some of the best releases in the history of Kerbal Space Program. Hope y'all have a great Christmas and Holidays. ;D
Merry Christmas guys! And thanks for making one of my fav games to date!
Happy holidays, you definitely earned it. I'm looking forward to next year more than ever.
Merry Christmas! Have a good break, and thanks again for a great year!

[TABLE=width: 64]

<tbody>[TR]

[TD=width: 64]Thank you for all of your hard work to give us one of the best games ever. Have a great Christmas break.[/TD]

[/TR]

</tbody>[/TABLE]
